{{Infobox football match | image = | pixel = | event = [[2008â09 Indonesia Super League U-21]] | team1 = [[Persita U-21]] | team1association = {{flagicon|IDN|size=30px}} | team1score = 1 | team2 = [[Pelita Jaya U-21]] | team2association = {{flagicon|IDN|size=30px}} | team2score = 2 | details = | date = 20 May 2009 | stadium = [[Jalak Harupat Soreang Stadium|Jalak Harupat Stadium]] | city = [[Soreang]], [[Bandung Regency]] | man_of_the_match1a = [[Dedi Kusnandar]] (Persita U-21) | man_of_the_match1atitle = ISL U-21 | man_of_the_match1b = | man_of_the_match1btitle = | referee = [[Armando Pribadi]] ([[Football Association of Indonesia|Indonesia]]) | attendance = 3,000 | weather = Fine | previous = | next = [[2010 Indonesia Super League U-21 Final|2010]] }} The '''2008â09 Indonesia Super League U-21 Final''' was an [[Association football|football]] match which was played on 20 May 2009. It was the 1st final of the [[Indonesia Super League U-21]]. The match was played at the [[Jalak Harupat Soreang Stadium|Jalak Harupat Stadium]] in [[Soreang]], [[Bandung Regency]] and was contested by [[Persita U-21]] of [[Tangerang]] and [[Pelita Jaya U-21]] from [[Karawang]]. Pelita U-21 and Persita U-21 was a debutant of the final stage. ==Match details== {{details|2008â09 Indonesia Super League U-21}} {{footballbox |date= 20 May 2009 |time= 15:00 ([[Time in Indonesia|WIB]]) |team1= [[Persita U-21]] |score= 1 â 2 |aet= yes |report= [http://www.liga-indonesia.co.id/bli/index.php?go=news.matchreview&matchID=2442&home=PERSITA%20U21 Report] |team2= [[Pelita Jaya U-21]] |goals1= [[Maulana]] {{goal|53}} |goals2= {{goal|20}} [[Ferdinand Alfred Sinaga|Ferdinand Sinaga]]
